en.title: You can continue with your divorce
en.servedByBailiffButResponse: Your {{ divorceWho }} was served by a court bailiff. However, they have not yet responded.
en.continueToDecreeNisi: Because it is more than 7 days since confirmation of service, you are now able to continue to the next stage and apply for a decree nisi.
